alert.note: Alert for San Joaquin; Stanislaus (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued March 11 at 1:06PM PST until March 11 at 1:45PM PST by NWS Sacramento
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 145 PM PST FOR NORTHERN SAN JOAQUIN AND NORTHERN STANISLAUS COUNTIES... At 104 PM PST, a severe thunderstorm was located over Garden Acres, or near Stockton, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...There was a public report of quarter sized hail in Stockton. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. Locations impacted include... Stockton, Waterloo, Farmington, Country Club, Taft Mosswood, Garden Acres, Kennedy, August, Linden, Morada, Lincoln Village and Lockeford. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Prepare immediately for large hail and deadly cloud to ground lightning. Seek shelter inside a well-built structure. Stay away from windows. This storm is producing large hail an inch in diameter. SEEK SHELTER NOW inside a sturdy structure. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Ponding on roads has been reported.
